title: Is League of Legends REALLY the most played game in the world?
body: The player figures published vary wildly between sources. Look at this board. Does it really look like the community of the most played game in the world? It's dead. I call bullshit. The player figures Riot reports are undoubtedly inflated.

replies.body: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/ Our server is quite small check out North America's
Well, LoL *has* an OCE server. I'm pretty sure that wouldn't be the case if it weren't one of the most played *multiplayer* games in the world.

>LoL has an OCE server

So does Day of Defeat, what's your point?
It has the most players but I don't think it's the most played
